definitions.definition: To sell goods for a lower price than a competitor .
examples: Our price-match guarantee: we will not be undersold !

definitions.definition: To sell something for less than its value .
To put forward an idea , or to market a new product (or oneself), with insufficient enthusiasm or excessive understatement .

main_definition: To sell goods for a lower price than a competitor .
secondary_definitions: To sell something for less than its value .
To put forward an idea , or to market a new product (or oneself), with insufficient enthusiasm or excessive understatement .
